disney_movie_analysis package¶

Submodules¶

disney_movie_analysis.clean_data module¶

disney_movie_analysis.clean_data.clean_imdb(imdb)[source]¶

Cleans dataframe that was scraped from IMDB using our scrape_imdb function.

Parameters:

imdb – Raw IMDB pandas dataframe.

Returns:

A cleaned IMDB dataframe.

disney_movie_analysis.clean_data.clean_rotten_tomatoes(rotten_tomatoes)[source]¶

Cleans dataframe that was scraped from Rotten Tomatoes using our scrape_rotten_tomatoes function.

Parameters:

rotten_tomatoes – Raw Rotten Tomatoes pandas dataframe.

Returns:

A cleaned Rotten Tomatoes dataframe.

disney_movie_analysis.scrape_data module¶

This script performs the webscraping and produces the raw dataset to be cleaned.

disney_movie_analysis.scrape_data.get_html_text(bs, name, attrs)[source]¶

A function to get certain text from scraped webpage without causing an error if it does not exist.

Parameters:

  • bs – A beautiful_soup object.

  • name – The name of the html class.

  • attrs – The attributes in the class that we are looking for.

Returns:

The text following the class and attribute if it exists, otherwise an NA.

disney_movie_analysis.scrape_data.scrape_imdb(webpage)[source]¶

Scrapes data from IMDB webpage.

Parameters:

webpage – An IMDB webpage link to get the data from.

Returns:

A raw, uncleaned IMDB dataframe.

disney_movie_analysis.scrape_data.scrape_rotten_tomatoes(webpage)[source]¶

Scrapes data from Rotten Tomatoes webpage.

Parameters:

webpage – A Rotten Tomatoes webpage link to get the data from.

Returns:

A raw, uncleaned Rotten Tomatoes dataframe.

disney_movie_analysis.analysis_functions module¶

disney_movie_analysis.analysis_functions.list_averages(dataframe, list_column, summary_column)[source]¶

Takes the averages for each value in a column of lists.

Parameters:

  • dataframe – The pandas dataframe being used.

  • list_column – The column of lists to apply the function on, in the form df[column]

  • summary_column – The column to take the averages over, in the form df[column]

Returns:

A pandas dataframe containing the averages for each of the list values.
